<h1>Test Textile</h1>

        <p>This page has some plain textile on it to test converting to html.</p>


        <h2>Textile Tests</h2>

        <p><strong>Bold Text</strong> <em>italic text</em></p>


<ul>
        <li>Bullet A</li>
        <li>Bullet B</li>
</ul>

<ol>
        <li>Item 1</li>
        <li>Item 2</li>
</ol>

        <table class="bordered">
                <tr>
                        <td>Cell 1</td>
                        <td>Cell 2</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                        <td>Cell 3</td>
                        <td>Cell 4</td>
                </tr>
        </table>



        <p>Line 1<br />Line 2<br />Line 3</p>


        <h2>Link Tests</h2>

        <p>[[Test]] Link to existing page</p>


        <p>[[Test new page]] Link to a new page</p>


        <p><img src="/images/add.gif" alt="" /> Test image</p>


        <h2>Preformatted test</h2>

<code>
<pre>
Preformatted code.
&lt;h1&gt;Sample Code&lt;/h1&gt;
</pre>
</code>

        <p>[[!include Test Include]]</p>
